Header.title: Wellness Center
Header.paragraph: Your trusted source for counseling and physical health support. Dedicated to your well-being and recovery.

About.paragraph: Our Wellness Center provides a safe and supportive environment to address physical health issues and offer professional counseling services. We are here to assist you with compassionate care and a focus on holistic well-being.

Services.name: Physical Health Care
Services.text: Comprehensive care for all physical health concerns, with a team of dedicated professionals to support your well-being.

Services.name: Counseling Services
Services.text: Professional counseling to help you navigate mental health challenges with confidentiality and compassion.

Services.name: Ambulance Services
Services.text: 24/7 emergency ambulance services to ensure prompt medical support and transport when needed.

Testimonials.text: "The counseling team at the Wellness Center helped me find clarity and peace. Their care and compassion were truly remarkable."
Testimonials.name: Alex M.

Testimonials.text: "I felt genuinely cared for during my physical health treatment at the center. I highly recommend their services."
Testimonials.name: Jordan P.

Testimonials.text: "The ambulance services were a lifesaver. Their prompt response and professionalism made all the difference in a critical time."
Testimonials.name: Chris K.

Map.title: Our Location
Map.text: Find us in the heart of campus, ready to serve the wellness needs of our community.
